main event: An officer observed a bright light in the sky while flying from Muroc, California to Wright-Patterson AF Base on March 7, 1952.
interesting points: The light was first sighted at a speed of 120 mph and appeared bright without any navigation lights., As the object approached, it went out briefly before reappearing., The object was reported to be at an altitude of over 10,000 feet., The sighting occurred in clear weather with no interference from the aircraft., The observer speculated it might have been another aircraft.
sighted object: a very bright light in the sky
witness description: an officer with many years of experience
